alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 5:57AM CDT until June 19 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Western Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Northern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 645 AM CDT. * At 556 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles northwest of Headland to 8 miles southeast of Opp, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Elba, Abbeville, Enterprise, Headland, Dothan, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Level Plains, Samson, Cowarts, Newton, Webb, New Brockton, Ariton, Pinckard and Malvern. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
